<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Delete a contact point</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"delete"} path={"/v1/grafana/api/v1/provisioning/contact-points/<<UID>>"}></MethodEndpoint>



Delete a contact point. 
Please ensure to change the region in the URL to match your account's region.
